name: Match Me If You Can (Felix-CodingClimber)
description:
Help the two puzzle pieces to find their way to each other.

You control both of them simultaneously.

Move both to the flag and avoid the water!

Controls:

Space to jump.

WASD or  arrows for moving.

Let me know if you experience any issues!

And have fun :)

Credits:

Footstep sounds by Owlish Media https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/

WaterSplash sound by Piotr Zaczek (blukotek)
https://freesound.org/people/blukotek/

Win sounds by LittleRobotSoundFactory
https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/

Ambience, Seaside Waves sound by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

My lovely girlfriend for her support during the jam :))
